alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 7:54AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD CONDITIONS WILL MAKE TRAVEL NEARLY IMPOSSIBLE FOR PORTIONS OF JEFFERSON COUNTY THIS MORNING... HAZARDS...The combination of a band of heavy snow and winds gusting to 55 mph is producing BLIZZARD conditions. Visibility within the band is often less than a quarter mile. DO NOT attempt to travel in this band. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 751 AM EST, band of heavy snow covered the northern half of Jefferson county from about Watertown and Fort Drum to the St Lawrence River. This band is expected to remain nearly stationary or drift a few miles north through 930 AM. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Watertown, Fort Drum, Clayton, Dexter, Glen Park, Redwood, Kring Point State Park, Wellesley Island State Park, Cedar Point State Park, Sackets Harbor, Black River, Philadelphia, Brownville, Alexandria Bay, Theresa, Cape Vincent, Antwerp, Chaumont, Evans Mills and Three Mile Bay. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 45 and 52. SAFETY INFO... Travel is nearly impossible in this area with blizzard condition. &&
